home.title: kimi-template - Production-Ready Next.js 16 Starter
home.description: A production-ready starter template with Next.js 16, Tailwind CSS v4, React 19, Better Auth, Drizzle ORM, PostgreSQL, shadcn/ui, and more.

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.description: Overview of your metrics and analytics

login.title: Sign In
login.description: Sign in to your account to access the dashboard

register.title: Sign Up
register.description: Create an account to get started

hero.title: Build faster with
hero.description: A production-ready starter template built with Next.js 16, Tailwind CSS v4, React 19, Better Auth, Drizzle ORM, and PostgreSQL. Features authentication, i18n, dashboard, and beautiful UI components.

features.title: Everything you need
features.description: A complete starter kit with all the features you need to build modern web applications.

performance.title: Lightning Fast
performance.description: Optimized for performance with Next.js App Router, React Server Components, and edge functions.

security.title: Secure by Default
security.description: Authentication with Better Auth, protected routes, and security best practices built-in.

i18n.title: Multi-language
i18n.description: Full internationalization support with next-intl. Ready for global audiences.

analytics.title: Analytics Dashboard
analytics.description: Beautiful dashboard with real-time data visualization using Recharts and TanStack Query.

ui.title: Beautiful UI
ui.description: Modern UI components with shadcn/ui, Tailwind CSS v4, and smooth Motion animations.

code.title: Type Safe
code.description: Full TypeScript support with strict type checking for a robust development experience.

cta.title: Ready to get started?
cta.description: Start building your next project with this production-ready template today.
